'''Wekeme''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|The vendor gestures to a bed of hot coals in his wagon, a flavorsome scent rising from bundles of meat-stuffed leaves.}}
A tremendously talented cook selling his wares from a cart in Periki's Overlook. He's particularly popular with [Tekēhu](/tekehu/).

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = All the basic food dishes in infinite amounts.

Only available in the morning (≥ hour 7 and < hour 17)
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
}}
